trans-unit.source: You will find below the hierarchy of the TypoScript objects available in the current TS template.
Simply click on the plus sign to display a section, and on an object to add it.

This wizard has been removed because of breaking changes in TYPO3 8. Basically the whole wizard needs to be rewritten to make it work again with newer TYPO3 versions. Therefor we kindly ask you to sponsor this feature. If we get enough donations, we will provide the wizard in an upcoming release. Thank you very much!
